projects.title: Gallery-of-Horns
projects.description: The Horned Beasts Gallery is a React.js web application featuring dynamic filtering and sorting, allowing users to browse a collection of creatures based on the number of horns or other criteria. Users can search for specific creatures and interact with them by favoriting using a heart icon. The app offers a modal display for detailed information and is built using reusable, modular components for easy customization. With its responsive design, the application provides a seamless browsing experience across various devices..

projects.title: Qode-Quiz
projects.description: Quizing program where users can test their knowledge and are given resources for topics they don't test well in.

projects.title: Odd Duck Product Co Voting App
projects.description: A web application that allows users to vote on their preferred product out of a selection of three, with the results displayed in a chart once all votes are cast. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and utilizing Chart.js for the chart displaying the voting results. Saved and retrieved data using local storage.
